participants.name: Kay (Mersereau) McDonald
participants.title: CEO| Social Entrepreneur | Cause Marketing Expert | Fundraising | Charity Bracelets | Branding Campaigns | Custom Charms

messages.message:
Hello Brian,

Thanks so much for connecting with me on LinkedIn!. I invite you to visit my website: www.charitycharms.com to learn about our concept: “Changing the World Through the Power of Charms” We create custom charm programs for non-profit organizations, schools, and businesses to raise awareness and funds. The custom charms are used for volunteer and recognition gifts, donation drives, swag bags, cause marketing, special events. They provide a wearable, tangible way for your community to share your message with others.

Please reach out to me or share my information with anyone if you think we can be of service.

“Charming” Regards, 

Kay McDonald CEO/Founder Charity Charms
602.615.3200
kay@charitycharms.com
Pretty cool. I like it! But are men really into charms? Who does the metallurgy?

Hello Brian,

We do custom programs making logos and taglines into wearable bracelets. So not targeting YOU perse, but perhaps a charity or company you engage with:).

Regards,
Kay
So for example I could order 200 ornaments for sojourner or Maggie's place for patrons of our local church to take from a Christmas tree display if they plan on donating this year?

Hi Brian,

Sort of...we would coordinate it through the charity because we are using their logo:)
